com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures.types

Class BitmapTexType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures.types.TexType
      • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures.types.BitmapTexType

  • public class BitmapTexType
extends TexType
    Bitmap texture type. Data is stored within a file as follows: ByteOffset : Description 0 (byte) : Bitmap.Config format. 1 => ALPHA_8, 4 => ARGB_888 1 (int) : Bitmap width 5 (int) : Bitmap height 9 (?) : Pixel data. Stored in either ALPHA_8 format or ARGB_8888 format.
    Author:
    jlreyes
